page.title: 03A TYPICAL WEEKEND
page.content: On Saturday morning I get up and make my mum a cup of tea.When I am dressed I go to call for Darren Wright. We go to the town and play on the computers in Boots and W.H.Smiths.I have my lunch at the Kentucky Fried chicken. In the afternoon I meet my mum and sister and sometimes she buys us some clothes.We then choose a video from Supervision to watch when we get home.During the evening I watch TV until bedtime. On Sunday morning I get up about 9.00 am After breakfast I watch the video again. In the afternoon I call for Darren again and we play in his Dads yard where he keeps old cars.Just outside we have a secret den.When I get home my mum gets me something to eat.During the evening I play some of my Atari games.I have a bath and go to bed at 9.00 p.m.
